author: nero_eth
content:
This is the EIP for Block Access Lists (BAL): https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9580/files (EIP-7928)

 I've been summarizing the design space here:
https://hackmd.io/3_Xv39sFSTmrV6POktj0HQ

The main 3 variants that are considered:
* BALs with `(address, storage key)`
* BALs with `(address, storage key, post-tx values)` (+ state diff)
* BALs with `(address, storage key, pre-tx-values, post-tx values)`  (+ state diff)

> Ethresearch post on transaction dependencies: https://ethresear.ch/t/execution-dependencies/22150
